title: Beginner Piano
description: Great for new pianists ages 6 and up. Basic skills and music theory.

title: Intermediate Violin
description: Focus on technique, posture, and repertoire development.

title: Advanced Piano
description: Master advanced pieces and improve technical skills.

title: Beginner Guitar
description: Start your guitar journey with chords and rhythm basics.

title: Voice Lessons
description: Improve vocal technique and breathing for all levels.

title: Music Theory 101
description: Learn the fundamentals of music reading and composition.

title: Jazz Improvisation
description: Explore jazz scales, chords, and creative playing.

title: Percussion Basics
description: Learn rhythms and basic drumming techniques.

title: Flute for Beginners
description: Start your flute playing with breathing and tone basics.

title: Cello Intermediate
description: Develop tone, bowing, and sight-reading skills.

title: Songwriting Workshop
description: Craft lyrics and melodies in a supportive setting.

title: Music Production Basics
description: Intro to digital music creation using popular software.

title: Beginner Ukulele
description: Learn chords, strumming, and simple songs.
